text: @marcorubio The only problem I have with how the coronavirus is being handled is HOW the coronavirus is being handled! Trump wasn’t concerned with it (it’s like a cold) until it started affecting the stock market, and then he put “pray away the gay” Pence in charge of it? Seriously? 😳

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
